title: The full game torrent

replies.body: well I was 60% through the download and the launcher just restarted it entirely
Im looking for a full game torrent too. Have you found it. I have the same problem as you btw.

The game doesn't work that way.  The patcher will need to be able to scan all of your game files and check for updates.  If you attempt to just transfer a full game, it's likely that the files will only last temporarily or rescan your game files every single time you open the patcher.  If you're running into errors, let me know, and I'll see if I can help.  Let me know!
